page.title: 03Bruce's Bakery,Great Ayton.
page.content: {Bruces Bakery}is situated on Newton Road.The bakery is a building built of sandstone and it has 2 attractive bow windows.The paintwork on the bakery is white .Above the window which faces the road there is a sign which says,"A & M Bruce Bakers And Confectionary".Bruces bake their bread,cakes and biscuits daily and Mr. Bruce thinks thats why his product sells so well.The building that is now the bakery used to belong to Thompsons,the hardware company,but Mr. Bruce bought the place off them about 20 years ago.Mr. Bruce has always been a baker and he says thats what he always wanted to be.When we visited the bakery I noticed that the machinery,sales counter,and the floors were very clean and the employees were very polite.If you ever visit Great Ayton,call in at Bruces Bakery.
